name: Bullet Boy: Arena
description:
This is a submission for the Game Makers Toolkit Jam 2018

I joined the jam 1 day late as i do everything so this was what i could do.

The flash files might be broken too, because this was intended to be a windows .exe application.

Use left click to launch yourself forward and kill the enemies, avoid the walls.

This game has infinite waves and 4 enemy types. New enemies unlock on wave 3, 5 and 7.
